detail_desc: Trousers in soft cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake side pockets and elasticated hems.
Trousers in soft cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake side pockets and elasticated hems.
Joggers in a soft, textured cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, leg pockets and elasticated hems.
Joggers in a soft, textured cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, leg pockets and elasticated hems.
Jacket in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a hood and zip down the front. Side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Fine-knit gloves with matching fingerless gloves with a print motif. The gloves can be worn together or separately.

Short-sleeved shirt in woven fabric with a matching bow tie. Shirt with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back, chest pocket, sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves, and a rounded hem. Pre-tied bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener at the back.

Short-sleeved shirt in woven fabric with a matching bow tie. Shirt with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back, chest pocket, sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves, and a rounded hem. Pre-tied bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener at the back.

Short-sleeved shirt in woven fabric with a matching bow tie. Shirt with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back, chest pocket, sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves, and a rounded hem. Pre-tied bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener at the back.
Short-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover, jersey-lined hood and kangaroo pocket. Second layer in contrasting colour jersey at the cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover, jersey-lined hood and kangaroo pocket. Second layer in contrasting colour jersey at the cuffs and hem.
Satin top with a V-neck, lace trim at the top and hem, and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Satin top with a V-neck, lace trim at the top and hem, and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Satin top with a V-neck, lace trim at the top and hem, and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.

Socks in soft, fine-knit merino wool with elasticated tops.

Glittery dressing up shoes in imitation leather with a strap across the foot with a hook and loop fastening at one side. Imitation leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 2.5 cm.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.

Shirt in soft, checked cotton flannel with a button-down collar, classic front and yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Rain trousers in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with welded seams, elastication at the back of the waist and press-studs at the sides. Elasticated hems, a reinforced elastic strap under the feet and a reflective detail. Adjustable elastic braces with plastic fasteners. Unlined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Rain jacket in patterned wind- and waterproof functional fabric with closed seams and a detachable hood with an elasticated front edge. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, flap side pockets with a press-stud, and elasticated cuffs. Unlined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Rain jacket in patterned wind- and waterproof functional fabric with closed seams and a detachable hood with an elasticated front edge. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, flap side pockets with a press-stud, and elasticated cuffs. Unlined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Jacket in windproof, water-repellent, breathable fabric with a rounded collar and detachable, lined hood. Zip down the front with a chin guard, flap patch pockets with a press-stud at the front, and ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.

Straight-cut shirt in an airy cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and an open chest pocket. Yoke with a pleat at the back, long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Straight-cut shirt in an airy cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and an open chest pocket. Yoke with a pleat at the back, long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Dungarees in stretch organic cotton denim. with a chest pocket and straps with a press-stud fastening. Press-studs at the sides, a seam and belt loops at the waist and concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs.
